overview: Maria is a 16 year old teenager who, after having her first sexual intercourse, tries to deal with the sexual tension that is around her.  Seeing that after losing her virginity nothing has really changed, she now tries to find out more about her intense and uncontrollable desires about other bodies and ends up discovering the pleasures of her own body, when masturbating Maria has her first orgasm.
title: Lençol Branco
